text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Apex Legends. The build quality of the ROG Zephyrus S Thin and Portable (2019) Gaming laptop, 15.6" 240 Hz G-SYNC FHD IPS, GeForce RTX 2070, i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 1 TB PCIe Hyper Drive SSD, Per-key RGB, Windows 10 Pro, GX502GW-XB76 is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ROG Zephyrus S Thin and Portable (2019) Gaming laptop, 15.6" 240 Hz G-SYNC FHD IPS, GeForce RTX 2070, i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 1 TB PCIe Hyper Drive SSD, Per-key RGB, Windows 10 Pro, GX502GW-XB76!

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the fan noise on the ROG Zephyrus S Thin and Portable (2019) Gaming laptop, 15.6" 240 Hz G-SYNC FHD IPS, GeForce RTX 2070, i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 1 TB PCIe Hyper Drive SSD, Per-key RGB, Windows 10 Pro, GX502GW-XB76. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the ROG Zephyrus S Thin and Portable (2019) Gaming laptop, 15.6" 240 Hz G-SYNC FHD IPS, GeForce RTX 2070, i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 1 TB PCIe Hyper Drive SSD, Per-key RGB, Windows 10 Pro, GX502GW-XB76 is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Elden Ring. The build quality of the ROG Zephyrus S Thin and Portable (2019) Gaming laptop, 15.6" 240 Hz G-SYNC FHD IPS, GeForce RTX 2070, i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 1 TB PCIe Hyper Drive SSD, Per-key RGB, Windows 10 Pro, GX502GW-XB76 is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
